Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: earwin45
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect phone and couldnt have asked for any better. the keyboard was perfect. in the reviews online i thought they were exaggerating but it really is way better. its a great android and is not only good for a first phone but also a phone all together. great phone but bad battery life.

Reviews.Title: This is a great cellphone
Reviews.Author: A. Lindros "Angel"
Reviews.Content: I gave it four stars (instead of five) because the keys are a little hard to push...you need to use a bit more pressure than what I would call 'normal' when using the physical keyboard.  I replaced my 'MyTouch Q' with this one, and, thus far, have been pleased with its performance.  The camera is hit or miss, but when it is 'hit,' the pictures are VERY sharp!  It phone, itself, is smaller than the MyTouch Q, but the screens seem to be nearly the same size.  I would definitely recommend this cellphone to those users who are adamant about having a 'qwerty' keyboard.  It is loaded with extras (like viewing contact history for any of your contacts by simply swiping left/right while on the contact's name).  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Better than any other phone I've had!
Reviews.Author: xXCustomer.AccustomedXx
Reviews.Content: Only problem is battery life, but you can get an app for that and certain backgrounds change your battery life significantly!Clear picture resolution on screen, great live wallpaper presentation, easy touch, amazing keyboard.All accessories for this phone are cheap now since it's not an iPhone but honestly, I prefer this phone over the Samsung Galaxy, and my current waterproof android. Switching back to this phone shortly!!

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: My Boyfriend loves his new phone. It was used, but when he received it. he was very happy with the results.

Reviews.Title: Not enough gb
Reviews.Author: Linda Gordon
Reviews.Content: It didnt have enough gb for what my son uses his phone for. It just wasnt what he thought it would be.
